glsa.title: GPL Ghostscript: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GPL Ghostscript, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Ghostscript is an interpreter for the PostScript language and for PDF.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GPL Ghostscript and the bundled OpenJPEG. Please review the CVE identifiers and GLSA-201612-26 (OpenJPEG) referenced below for additional information.
Note: GPL Ghostscript in Gentoo since app-text/ghostscript-gpl-9.20-r1 no longer bundles OpenJPEG.

impact.p: A context-dependent attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PostScript file or PDF using GPL Ghostscript possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
